name: smileyPC
description:
GMTK GAMJAM 2020

guide:

1. play 3 games, pay close attention to the environment.

2. A fatal error message will appear, after all games are played the story starts. (every game must get a fatal error)

3. Enter the password to win

!!PLEASE USE CAPS FOR THE END PASSWORD!!

also: 

there is a problem on the first game. Fighting the boss takes too long or goes out of the level. Just press ESC, you will be redirected to home. play the other 2 games, get 1 fatal error to continue
